it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.action

Class ActionCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.action.ActionCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ActionCard
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a representation of the actions the player can perform. The actions can be distinguished in:
    • Normal actions, of which a number indicated by maxActions can be performed during turn
    • A final action (which is optional) that can be performed when the normal actions are over, before passing the turn to the next player
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Lorenzo Farinelli, Tiziano Fucci
    See Also:
    ActionCardCreator, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionCard

        public ActionCard(int maxActions,
                  ActionCardEnum type,
                  Collection<ActionEnum> actions,
                  ActionEnum finalAction)
        Construct the action card, it will be totally immutable.
        Parameters:
        maxActions - Maximum number of actions performable during a turn, also referred to as multiplier, must be positive
        type - Identifier of the type of action card, not null
        actions - Collection of "normal" actions, not null and not empty
        finalAction - Optional "final" action, can be null

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxActions

        public int getMaxActions()
        Returns maximum number of actions performable by player during turn.
        Returns:
        maximum actions per turn (multiplier)

      • getType

        public ActionCardEnum getType()
        Returns the type of action card which identifies when it is used.
        Returns:
        action card type

      • getActions

        public Collection<ActionEnum> getActions()
        Returns the "normal" actions in this card.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable collection of actions

      • hasAction

        public boolean hasAction(ActionEnum action)
        Returns wether an action is a "normal" action in this card or not.
        Parameters:
        action - the action you want to check, not null
        Returns:
        true if it is a "normal" action, false otherwise

      • getFinalAction

        public ActionEnum getFinalAction()
        Returns final action.
        Returns:
        final action, if any, null otherwise

      • hasFinalAction

        public boolean hasFinalAction()
        Returns whether this card has a final action or not.
        Returns:
        true if it has a final action, false otherwise

      • initial

        public static ActionCard initial()
        Returns the action card used at the beginning of the match. Uses ActionCardCreator, so make sure it has been properly set up before calling this
        Returns:
        the action card used at the beginning of the match

      • next

        public ActionCard next(int currentDamage)
        Returns the action card which has to be substituted to this given the damage of its owner. This works to set/reset adrenaline actions, but it doesn't provide a way to switch between the action cards for the regular mode and the ones for the frenzy mode Uses ActionCardCreator, so make sure it has been properly set up before calling this
        Parameters:
        currentDamage - The current damage of the player, to determine adrenaline actions
        Returns:
        The action card that has to be substituted to this. If it needs no substitution, the same action card is returned
